name: embedding-search
description: Minimal vector similarity search for embeddings

ai.summary: Search and compare embedding vectors with cosine similarity, top-k retrieval, batch queries, and deduplication.
capabilities: Compute cosine similarity between two embedding vectors
Find the k most similar items to a query embedding
Run batch similarity search across multiple queries
Deduplicate items by embedding similarity threshold
ai.usage:
from aigogo.embedding_search import cosine_similarity, top_k, deduplicate
score = cosine_similarity(vec_a, vec_b)
results = top_k(query_vec, [(id, emb), ...], k=5)
unique = deduplicate(items, threshold=0.95)
ai.inputs: Embedding vectors as lists of floats, corpus as list of (id, embedding) tuples
ai.outputs: Similarity scores (float), ranked result lists of (id, score) tuples
